greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Define a sequence by b(1) = n, b(m) = b(m-1) + b(m-1)/A052126(m) + 1; then a(n) is the least m such that b(m) belongs to A270807.
link: Chai Wah Wu, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: f[n_] := n + n/FactorInteger[n][[-1, 1]] + 1; s = NestList[f, 1, 10^2]; Table[Length@ NestWhileList[f, n, ! MemberQ[s, #] &], {n, 120}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Apr 08 2016 *)
results.author: _Cody M. Haderlie_, Apr 06 2016
ext: a(75) corrected by _Chai Wah Wu_, Apr 06 2016
